text: Martin Lejsal (born 16 September 1982 in Kyjov) is a Czech football goalkeeper who is currently unattached. He played in several countries, but mostly at home for FC Zbrojovka Brno. In July 2005 he was banned for 6 months due to Caso Genoa. ==External links== * 1.
